channel.title: Modifying interface options to show "Make All"
channel.description:
Alright, so you know how it's possible to change interface rightclick options by editing it's itemAction[int]?
Well if you don't, you can.
I have the "Buy 50" changed to "Buy X", and the "Sell 50" to "Sell All". But I can't seem to change "Make X" to "Make All" on the fletching interface.
What do I mean? This interface: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SunSqhe.png[/img]
Sidenote: if anyone wants to know how to change buy 50 and sell 50, ask :P
